H0.text: who was the first dictator of the soviet union. Vladimir Lenin

H1.text: who was the first dictator of the soviet union. Leon Trotsky

H2.text: who was the first dictator of the soviet union. Grigory Zinoviev

H3.text: who was the first dictator of the soviet union. Joseph Stalin

A4.text: some historians noted that his policies led to the establishment of a totalitarian system in the USSR, while others (including Volkogonov) directly characterized his government as a totalitarian regime

A5.text: Volkogonov believed that whereas Lenin established a 'dictatorship of the Party', it would only be under Stalin that the Soviet Union became the 'dictatorship of one man'
